text: Geum Kyo-jin (; born 3 January 1992) is a South Korean footballer who plays as a full-back. ==Career== He joined Daegu FC in 2014. ==References== == External links == * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Yeungnam University alumni Category:Association football fullbacks Category:South Korean footballers Category:Daegu FC players Category:Daejeon Hana Citizen FC players Category:FC Seoul players Category:Seoul E-Land FC players Category:K League 2 players Category:Korea National League players Category:K League 1 players
title: Geum Kyo-jin
